## DEFAULT\_ENTITY\_RIGID\_BODY\_OPTIONS variable

The default rigid body options for a model entity when EntityOptions.rigidBodyOptions is not provided.

**Signature:**

```typescript
DEFAULT_ENTITY_RIGID_BODY_OPTIONS: RigidBodyOptions
```
